EmailTemplate.description: PP notification of conversion to Scheduled Consult
EmailTemplate.name: PP notification of conversion to Scheduled Consult
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} has scheduled a consult
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName} has converted from "Seminar Scheduled" to Consult Scheduled. Click on the following link for more details:
{!Lead.Link}
